dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 contains 60,000 samples of 32 × 32 color images from 100 classes, with 500 training and 100 test samples for each class.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Olga Russakovsky

dcterms:description: ImageNet-Subset is based on a subset of 100 classes sampled from the full ImageNet dataset, which contains around 1.3 million samples of 224 × 224 color images from 1,000 classes.
dcterms:title: ImageNet-Subset

dcterms:creator: Olga Russakovsky
Jia Deng

Jonathan Krause
Sanjeev Satheesh
Sean Ma
Zhiheng Huang
Andrej Karpathy
Aditya Khosla
Michael Bernstein
dcterms:description: ImageNet-Full uses the full set of 1,000 classes from the ImageNet dataset, which contains around 1.3 million samples of 224 × 224 color images.
dcterms:title: ImageNet-Full
